articles.title: Decoding imagined language to treat people suffering from aphasia - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: What if it were possible to decode the internal language of individuals deprived of the ability to express themselves? This is the objective of a team of neuroscientists from the University of Geneva (UNIGE) and the University Hospitals of Geneva.

articles.title: Genting's shipbuilding units in Germany file for bankruptcy - The Star Online
articles.description: Frankfurt: Asian tourism and casinos giant Genting’s shipbuilding subsidiaries in Germany filed for bankruptcy on Monday, which one union leader described as a “dark day” for the country’s dockyards.
articles.content:
